items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty indicates a flat start; US, Asian markets gain
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Wall Street stocks rose and the Dow scored a second consecutive all-time closing high on Friday, with Tesla and Amazon climbing after fresh U.S. economic data raised expectations that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates modestly in September. The S&P 500 climbed 1.01% to end at 5,648.40 points. The Nasdaq Composite Index climbed 1.13% to 17,713.62 points, while the Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 0.55% to 41,563.08 points.

items.title: Cement stocks in focus after Macquarie highlights price pressures, sluggish demand
items.description: Macquarie's cautious outlook on cement stocks reflects ongoing demand challenges and price pressures, with mixed ratings across key players as the sector faces near-term risks.

items.title: NBCC India approves bonus issue; multibagger PSU stock in focus, up 233% in 1 year
items.description: NBCC (India) stock in focus as its board recommended a 1:2 bonus issue, issuing one additional share for every two held, with the record date set for October 7.

items.title: How power sector revival altered plans of CESC, Adani Power
items.description: CESC is scaling up green energy capacities. Adani Power, which once contemplated delisting, is aiming to double its electricity generation capacity base

items.title: Brokerages trim India's GDP outlook for FY25, expect it to remain below RBI's 7.2% target
items.description: Brokerages, however, expect some sequential uptick in the second half of FY25, supported by strong capex and revival in rural consumption

items.title: Hero MotoCorp gains 3% after auto sales rises 5% in August
items.description: With a faster recovery expected in the rural segment, growth in the 125cc segment, new launches in scooters and strong investment in power brands, Hero MotoCorp expects to grow ahead of the industry.

items.title: Biocon shares gain after arm gets multiple USFDA approval
items.description: Biocon Share Price | The company has also received a demand order from the GST Department in Delhi, imposing a penalty of Rs 40,000.

items.title: GPT Infra shares gain 2% on winning project worth Rs 204 crore
items.description: GPT Infraprojects Share Price | The contract, awarded by CAO Construction, South Eastern Railway.

items.title: Thangamayil Jewellery shares gain 7% after HDFC Securities initiates coverage with buy rating; ups target price to Rs 2500
items.description: The brokerage expects Thangamayil Jewellery, a prominent player in Tamil Nadu, to achieve a revenue CAGR of 26%, EBITDA CAGR of 33%, and PAT CAGR of 41% over FY24-27. This growth is fueled by the advantages of formalization, rapid store expansion, value-for-money products, and access to capital at competitive rates.

items.title: Axis Bank in focus as UBS hikes target price amid attractive valuations versus peers
items.description: UBS analysts expect Axis Bank's re-rating to require stable credit quality and growth
